title: Cyberpunk 2077 - Nebenmissionen sind wichtig!
body:
Cyberpunk 2077 – Nebenmissionen sind wichtig!

Neben Red Dead Redemption 2 ist auch Cyberpunk 2077 einer der wichtigsten Titel in der kommenden Zeit. Dabei wird Cyberpunk 2077 endlich etwas einführen nach dem wir uns schon viele Jahre sehnen. Eigentlich hätte man dieses Feature schon lange erwartet und teilweise wurde es auch schon in gewissen Spielen genutzt. Cyberpunkt 2077 wird (more…)

View On WordPress

tags: I just had to give her a little shoutout
everything I know about cyberpunk lore I have learned from her!
title: Interested in Cyberpunk lore?
body:
I highly recommend checking out a YouTube channel called Madqueen Show! She has a shit ton of videos explaining the lore of Cyberpunk 2020 & 2077, and I think she does a great job telling us viewers everything we need to know about the world and its people. The videos also include subtitles.

If you are unsure where to start, this is a good one to begin with.

If you are unsure where to start, this is a good one to begin with.

blog.name: lmaverick123
blog.title: Lucien Maverick's Tumblr
blog.description: Just some guy, trying to figure it all out.  I'm kind of crazy that way. Lots of people have little tidbits about what they are about. Okay.  Insane.  Bored.  Bring up "preferred pronouns" and we'll throat-punch you.  How are you doing?

title: Top 10 Questions About Cyberpunk 2077
body:
Top 10 Questions About Cyberpunk 2077

I know that I wrote in a post that people shouldn’t get aboard the hype train too much because that’s where insane crunch like the 100 hour work weeks at Rockstar comes from, but I can’t help it!  This game has me on the line, and every piece of news that comes out is magic to me.  I’ve watched the 48 minute gameplay demo 1000 times by now.  I hang on every detail.  I could go on about it for…

View On WordPress

summary: Kingdom Hearts 3 is coming? Are you a fan of the series? Stacy and Kami discusses the series as a whole and then talk about what...
body:
Kingdom Hearts 3 is coming? Are you a fan of the series? Stacy and Kami discusses the series as a whole and then talk about what they expect from the sequel. Before they break in that topic, they discuss the games they are playing and bring you some game news. Listen to find out!

Do you like this episode? Wanna complain about something we got wrong? Let us know what you think by dropping a comment below or emailing us at info@templeofgeek.com. We really want to hear your opinions!

Subscribe: iTunes / Google Play / Stitcher

CHECK THIS OUT

  1. Realms Con Official Site
  2. Spider-Man PS4: The 11 Most Fascinating Easter Eggs And Marvel References
  3. Telltale Games is closing, and we may never get to see the end of Clementine’s story

 

ON THIS EPISODE

Hosts – Stacy Bishop & Kami Watkins

SEGMENTS-
Around The Room/What Are You Playing? (01:11)
Game News (13:50)
Parental Controls In Gaming (28:57)

description:

Relationships: Female V/Jackie Welles
Characters: Female V - Character, Jackie Welles
Additional Tags: Valentinos, Jackie sleeps with married women, V has a crush on Jackie, V tries to make Jackie jealous, they work on a job and get closer, unbetad
Summary:

Jackie is a member of that poser gang, The Valentinos. V has a crush on Jackie but Jackie doesn’t take it seriously. That is, until he sees V getting close with another guy, then it’s Jackie that has to up his game.

summary: Fuck you GOG and CD Projekt Red
title: Fuck you GOG and CD Projekt Red
body:
So, back in August, CD Projekt Red pulled this “edgy” asshole transphobic joke out of their hat: https://www.kotaku.com.au/2018/08/cyberpunk-2077-tweets-transphobic-joke-studio-apologises-to-all-those-offended/

They own GOG.com, who decided it would be fun to use a hashtag about the Trump administration’s leaked plan to try and legally delete Trans people out of existence (to say nothing of giving cover to bigots and transphobes).

“Fires are a tragedy that cause terrible burns to the human body… but you know what puts out a burning thirst? GATORADE!”

Like, that’s exactly the level of cluelessness and lack of class on display here.

Of course, they followed it up with an absolute non-apology to never do it again:

This is statement that:

  • Utterly fails at the proper characterization of what’s going on by framing the livelihood and lives of Trans people as  a mere “social debate”, just a fun jousting of words and exercises, aren’t rights that aren’t about straight males fun?
  • Fails to show any understanding, let alone ownership of how actively harmful this is through tacit incitement
  • Never once even attempts an apology, even a faux “sorry if you were offended” one.

At what point do you stop playing the “few bad apples in a bunch” argument as a way to rationalize playing shiny pretty games, and realize that a particular company/publisher is likely rife with endemic transphobia?
